title: For the Trendifit of Mr. Zeit 3/10: Johnny Damon, Brooklyn Dad, Trump, Tony Hawk
itunes:title: For the Trendifit of Mr. Zeit 3/10: Johnny Damon, Brooklyn Dad, Trump, Tony Hawk
description:
On this edition of For the Trendifit of Mr. Zeit Jack and Miles discuss Johnny Damon fully embracing Blue Lives Matter, Brooklyn Dad slammed for taking PAC money, Trump asking supporters to send money to his PAC and not the GOP, and Tony Hawk kinda looks like Tony Hawk!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
